person.persName: Watson Longest (Hancock County, KY, farmer, Home Guard member, and hemp spinner)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer, hemp spinner, and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth "Lizzie" Clement Longest in Shelby County, Kentucky, on March 3, 1847. Father of Legrand Longest, Georgia A. Longest, Mary E. Longest, John H. Longest, and Elizabeth Longest. Hemp spinner in Shelby County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in Shelby County in 1850. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860. Served in the Hancock County Home Guard in June 1861.
